@sethx1

From the included Readme.txt file:

Installation notes:
**************

- Disconnect internet during installation, and/or make sure to NOT let the prog 
  connect to internet (block unwanted connections by using e.g. a firewall).

- After installation copy the cracked file from the crack folder into the 
  install dir of Blaze Media Pro (to have it replaced with the original file).
  Default install path is -> C:\Program Files\Blaze Media Pro


Done!



NOTE: - Block the program from accessing internet (with eg. a firewall)!
      - Do NOT update the program!


I don't see any Chinese in the instuctions, unlike in your post.

As long as you disconnect your internet connection before installing, then you will have no problems. After installing the program, copy the crack to your install directory. Then reconnect your internet, and start the program!
